branchCategory.name: TKS
branchCategory.description: TKS series was designed for easy tube stripping and compactness. TKS series can strip the outer layer tubing of SMC's flame resistant double layer tubing TRB (nylon) and TRBU (polyurethane) series. Since TKS can be attached to an electric tool, automatic stripping work is possible.

branchItem.name: TKS, Double Layer Tube Stripper
branchItem.description: TKS series was designed for easy tube stripping and compactness. TKS series can strip the outer layer tubing of SMC's flame resistant double layer tubing TRB (nylon) and TRBU (polyurethane) series. Since TKS can be attached to an electric tool, automatic stripping work is possible.
